workflow.name: Generate AI-powered lease renewal offers with Ollama LLM, Supabase and Gmail
workflow.description:
# üìÑ Automated Lease Renewal Offer by Email

## ‚úÖ Features
- Automated Lease Offer Generation using AI (Ollama model).
- Duplicate File Check to avoid reprocessing the same customer.
- Personalized Offer Letter creation based on customer details from Supabase.
- PDF/Text File Conversion for formatted output.
- Automatic Google Drive Management for storing and retrieving files.
- Email Sending with generated offer letter attached.
- Seamless Integration with Supabase, Google Drive, Gmail, and AI LLM.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works
1. Trigger: Workflow starts on form submission with customer details.

2. Customer Lookup:

- Searches Supabase for customer data.
- Updates customer information if needed.

3. File Search & Duplication Check:

- Looks for existing lease offer files in Google Drive.

- If duplicate found, deletes old file before proceeding.

4. AI Lease Offer Creation:

- Uses the LLM Chain (offerLetter) to generate a customized lease renewal letter.

5. File Conversion:

- Converts AI-generated text into a downloadable file format.

6. Upload to Drive:

- Saves the new lease offer in Google Drive.

7. Email Preparation:

- Uses Basic LLM Chain-email to draft the email body.

- Downloads the offer file from Drive and attaches it.

8. Email Sending:

- Sends the renewal offer email via Gmail to the customer.

## üõ† Setup Steps
1. Supabase Connection:

- Add Supabase credentials in n8n.

- Ensure a customers table exists with relevant columns.

## üîúFuture Steps
- Add specific letter template (organization template).
- PDF offer letter

parameters.jsonOutput:
{
  "landload_address": "Lakindu Siriwardana, Neuenlander Str. 28201 Bremen, Germany.",
  "contact_email": "user@example.com",
  "contact_phone": "+491739XXXXXX",
  "company_name": "HX GmbH",
  "landload_name": "Lakindu Siriwardana"
}

parameters.text:
=You are an assistant that writes professional business emails.  
Refer to the provided text as the source of details.  
Write a formal letter to the client based on that text.  

Requirements:  
- The email should be short and mentioned find the attached document.  
- No explanations, notes, or extra text ‚Äî output only the final email content.  
- Do not include any labels like "Email:" or "Dear [Name]" unless part of the actual email.  
- The email must start directly with the greeting and end with the closing signature.  
- don't import subject field

[Provided text: {{ $('Basic LLM Chain-offerLetter').item.json.text }}]

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
